GE07bhg4c01u:534: nanu tvaṃ yoddhā, na tu yuddha-prekṣakas tatas tad-darśanena kim iti cet

GE07bhg4c01u:620: he kṛṣṇa yoddhum icchataḥ purataḥ samavasthitān svajanān
GE07bhg4c01u:621: bandhu-janān dṛṣṭvā madīyāni gātrāṇi karacaraṇādīni sīdanti viśīryante |

GE07bhg4c01u:644: tataś ca yuddhe vijayino mama rājya-lābhāt sukhaṃ na bhaviṣyati, kintu tad-viparītam anutāpa-duḥkham eva bhāvīty arthaḥ ||30||

GE07bhg4c01u:656: Viśvanātha: śreyo na paśyāmīti dvāv imau puruṣau loke
GE07bhg4c01u:658: parivrāḍ yoga-yuktaś ca raṇe cābhimukhe hataḥ ||

GE07bhg4c01u:664: āhave svajanaṃ hatvā śreyo naiva paśyāmīti
GE07bhg4c01u:666: parivrāḍ yoga-yuktaś ca raṇe cābhimukhe hataḥ || ity ādinā hatasya śreyaḥ-smaraṇāt hantur me na

GE07bhg4c01u:709: teṣāṃ ghāte sukha-sambhavād iti cet tatrāha nihatyeti |
GE07bhg4c01u:710: dhārtarāṣṭrān duryodhanādīn nihatya sthitānāṃ naḥ pāṇḍāvānāṃ kā prītiḥ prasannatā syān na kāpīti acira-sukhābhāsa-spṛhayā ciratara-naraka-hetu-bhrāṛho na yogya iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:711: he janārdaneti yady ete hantavyās tarhi bhūbhārāpahārī tvam eva tān hahi pareśasya te pāpa-gandha-sambandho na bhaved iti vyajyate
GE07bhg4c01u:714: tasmān nārhā vayaṃ hantuṃ dhārtarāṣṭrān svabāndhavān |
GE07bhg4c01u:715: svajanaṃ hi kathaṃ hatvā sukhinaḥ syāma mādhava ||36||
GE07bhg4c01u:716: Śrīdhara: nanu ca agnido garadaś caiva śastra-pāṇir dhanāpahaḥ |

GE07bhg4c01u:718: ṣaḍbhir hetubhir ete tāvad ātatāyinaḥ ātatāyināṃ ca vadho yukta eva |

GE07bhg4c01u:725: yathoktaṃ yājñavalkyena smṛtyor virodhe nyāyas tu balavān vyavahārataḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:726: artha-śāstrāt tu balavān dharma-śāstram iti sthitiḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c01u:727: tasmād ātatāyinām apy eteṣām ācāryādīnāṃ vadhe 'smākaṃ pāpam eva bhavet |
GE07bhg4c01u:728: anyāyyatvād adharmatvāc caitad vadhasya amutra ceha vā na sukhaṃ syād ity āha svajanam iti
GE07bhg4c01u:729: Viśvanātha: nanu agnido garadaś caiva śastra-pāṇir dhanāpahaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:730: kṣetra-dārāpahārī ca ṣaḍ ete hy ātatāyinaḥ || iti |

GE07bhg4c01u:736: ātatāyinam āyāntam ity ādikam artha-śāstraṃ dharma-śāstrāt
GE07bhg4c01u:738: yad uktaṃ yājñavalkyena artha-śāstrāt tu balavad dharma-śāstram
GE07bhg4c01u:740: tasmād ācāryādīnāṃ vadhe pāpaṃ syād eva |

GE07bhg4c01u:749: artha-śāstrāt tu balavad dharma-śāstram iti sthitiḥ || iti smṛteḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:757: na hi gurubhir bandhu-janaiś ca vināsmākaṃ rājya-bhogaḥ sukhāyāpi tu anutāpāyaiva sampatsyate
GE07bhg4c01u:758: he mādhaveti śrīpatis tvam aśrīke yuddhe kathaṃ pravartayasiīti bhāvaḥ ||36||
GE07bhg4c01u:760: yady apy ete na paśyanti lobhopahata-cetasaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:762: kathaṃ na jñeyam asmābhiḥ pāpād asmān nivartitum |
GE07bhg4c01u:764: Śrīdhara: nanu tavaiteṣām api bandhu-vadha-doṣe samāne sati yathaivaite
GE07bhg4c01u:766: tathaiva bhavān api pravartatāṃ kim anena viṣādenety ata āha yadyapīti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c01u:767_0: rājya-lobhenopahataṃ bhraṣṭa-vivekaṃ ceto yeṣāṃ te ete duryodhanādayo yadyapi doṣaṃ
GE07bhg4c01u:767_1: na paśyanti, tathāpi asmābhir doṣaṃ prapaśyadbhir asmāt pāpāt nivartituṃ kathaṃ na
GE07bhg4c01u:767_2: jñeyaṃ nivṛttāv eva buddhiḥ kartavyety arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c01u:768: Viśvanātha: nanv ete tarhi kathaṃ yuddhe vartante |
GE07bhg4c01u:770: Baladeva: nanu āhūto na nivarteta dyūtād api raṇād api viditaṃ
GE07bhg4c01u:771: kṣatriyasyeti kṣatra-dharma-smaraṇāt tair āhūtānāṃ bhavatāṃ yuddhe pravṛttir yukteti cet tatrāha yadyapīhi dvābhyām |

GE07bhg4c01u:778: tathā ca śyenenābhicaran yajeta ity ādi śāstrokte 'pi śyenādāv ivāniṣṭānubandhitvād yuddhe 'smin naḥ pravṛttir na yukteti |
GE07bhg4c01u:779: āhūta ity ādi śāstraṃ tu kula-kṣaya-doṣaṃ vinā bhūta-viṣayaṃ bhāvi |
GE07bhg4c01u:783: dharme naṣṭe kulaṃ kṛtsnam adharmo 'bhibhavaty uta ||39||
GE07bhg4c01u:784: Śrīdhara: tam eva doṣaṃ darśayati kula-kṣaya ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c01u:786: uta api avaśiṣṭaṃ kṛtsnam api kulam adharmo 'bhibhavati
GE07bhg4c01u:790: Baladeva: doṣam eva prapañcayati kula-kṣaya iti |
GE07bhg4c01u:792: agni-hotrādayo dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ kula-paraspara-prāptāḥ praṇaśyanti kartur vināśāt |
GE07bhg4c01u:793: utety apy arthe kṛtsnam ity anena sambadhyate |
GE07bhg4c01u:794: dharme naṣṭe saty avaśiṣṭaṃ bālādi-kṛtsnam api kulam adharmo 'bhibhavati satīty arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c01u:798: Śrīdhara: tataś ca adharmābhibhavād ity ādi ||40||
GE07bhg4c01u:800: adharma eva tā vyabhicāre pravartayatīti bhāvaḥ ||40||
GE07bhg4c01u:802: asmad-bhartṛbhir dharmam ullaṅghya yathā̆akula-kṣaya-lakṣaṇe pāpe vartitaṃ, tathāsmābhiḥ pātivratyam avajñāya
GE07bhg4c01u:803: durācāre vartitavyam iti durbuddhi-hatāḥ kula-striyaḥ praduṣyeyur ity arthaḥ ||40||
GE07bhg4c01u:807: Śrīdhara: evaṃ sati saṅkara ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c01u:809: hi yasmāt luptāḥ piṇḍodaka-kriyā yeṣāṃ te tathā |
GE07bhg4c01u:811: Baladeva: kulasya saṅkaraḥ kula-ghnānāṃ narakāyaiveti yojanā |
GE07bhg4c01u:812: na kevalaṃ kula-ghnā eva narake patanti, kintu tat-pitaro 'pīty āha patantīti hir
GE07bhg4c01u:814: paṇḍādi dātṝṇāṃ putrādīnām abhāvād vilupta-piṇḍādi-kriyā santas te narakāyaiva patanti
GE07bhg4c01u:818: Śrīdhara: ukta-doṣam upasaṃharati doṣair iti dvābhyāṃ |

GE07bhg4c01u:842: apaśāt-tāpinaḥ kaṣṭān nirayān yānti dāruṇān || ity ādi vākyaiḥ ||43||
GE07bhg4c01u:844: aho bata mahat pāpaṃ kartuṃ vyavasitā vayam |
GE07bhg4c01u:846: Śrīdhara: bandhu-vadhādhyavasāyena santy upamāne āha aho batetyādi |

GE07bhg4c01u:848: aho bata mahat kaṣṭam ity arthaḥ ||44||
GE07bhg4c01u:850: Baladeva: bandhu-vadhādhyavasāyenāpi pāpaṃ sambhāvyānupapannāha aho iti |
